testMod:DualityStarterRelic.NAME: Duality
testMod:DualityStarterRelic.FLAVOR: Just as we have two eyes and two feet, duality is a part of life.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn deal damage to all enemies equal to your [#fffba1]Light[]. At the end of combat, heal hp equal to your [#8f918e]Dark[].

testMod:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

testMod:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
testMod:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.
